thread.section_title: Le 10 Bis Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: The breakfast fuels you up
thread.title_full: The breakfast fuels you up - Review of Le 10 Bis Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: strong a
title: The breakfast fuels you up
text:
A nice, clean and tidy hotel with good sound insulation for the room. You can have a good rest after a long day.
It sits closely to the metro station Porte Maillot that brings you to the luxury shop without any change of line.
The breakfast is the bright point to fuel you up for the next journey.
Everything is just nice and neat. Putting the sweet aromatic jam on their freshly baked bread awaken every pairs of dreary heavy eyelids.
